company1.products_sql: SELECT product FROM income ORDER BY year DESC
company1.abc_sql: SELECT year FROM income ORDER BY year DESC
company1.xyz_sql: SELECT january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december FROM income ORDER BY year DESC

company2.products_sql: SELECT product FROM margin ORDER BY total DESC
company2.abc_sql: SELECT total FROM margin ORDER BY total DESC
company2.xyz_sql: SELECT q1, q2, q3, q4 FROM margin ORDER BY total DESC
